info.name: Magic Items from Pointy Hat's YouTube

description.p: This sword hums an almost imperceptible tune when wielded that only its user can hear. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic sword. As a bonus action, you can make the banshee blade either sing or shriek.

ul.li: When the banshee blade sings, you select up to four creatures you can see, which can include yourself. The selected creatures add a +1 to their attack rolls when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade.
When the banshee blade shrieks, you select up to four creatures you can see. The selected creatures subtract a -1 to their attack rolls when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade.

description.p: While the banshee blade is singing or shrieking, you have disadvantage on stealth checks. The banshee blade sings or shrieks for 4 turns. Once the banshee blade has sung or shrieked, it can’t do so again until you finish a short rest.

This sword sings an inspiring song when wielded that only its user can hear. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic sword. As a bonus action, you can make the empowered banshee blade either sing or shriek.

ul.li: When the empowered banshee blade sings, you select up to four creatures you can see, which can include yourself. The selected creatures add a 1d4 to all their attack rolls when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade. You reroll the d4 each time a selected creature attacks.

When the empowered banshee blade shrieks, you select up to four creatures you can see. The selected creatures subtract a 1d4 to all their attack rolls when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade. You reroll the d4 each time a selected creature attacks.

description.p: While the banshee blade is singing or shrieking, you have disadvantage on stealth checks. The banshee blade sings or shrieks for 4 turns. Once the banshee blade has sung or shrieked, it can’t do so again until you finish a short rest.

This sword chants a stirring hymn when wielded that only its user can hear. You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic sword. As a bonus action, you can make the exalted banshee blade either sing or shriek.

ul.li: When the exalted banshee blade sings, you select up to four creatures you can see, which can include yourself. The selected creatures add a 1d4 to all their attack rolls and saving throws when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade. You reroll the d4 each time a selected creature attacks or makes a saving throw.

When the exalted banshee blade shrieks, you select up to four creatures you can see. The selected creatures subtract a 1d4 to all their attack rolls and saving throws when they are within 10 feet of the banshee blade. You reroll the d4 each time a selected creature attacks or makes a saving throw.
